headline: PagerDuty: I See Operational Progress, But Growth Needs A Second Act
summary: PagerDuty's operational gains and platform stickiness shine, but slowing growth, competition, and valuation are challenges. Click here to read why PD is a Hold.

headline: Datadog, Inc. (DDOG): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Datadog, Inc. (DDOG) on @bigbullcap on X (Twitter). In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DDOG. Datadog, Inc. (DDOG)’s share was trading at $114.46 as of 23rd May. DDOG’s trailing and forward P/E were 243.53 and 60.61 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Datadog (DDOG) continues to distinguish […]
